title: In addition to the provisions mentioned in these Regulations, following additional provisions shall be applicable for the areas of the Regional Plans / Authorities mentioned hereinunder
clause_text: In addition to the provisions mentioned in these Regulations, following additional provisions shall be applicable for the areas of the Regional Plans / Authorities mentioned hereinunder. These provisions shall prevail over the provisions, if any, mentioned in this Development Control and Promotion Regulations to that extent.
section: Composite development of Bus Terminal / Bus Depot / Truck Terminal for cities having population of 5 lacs and above â€“
